text:
@parscale @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Looks like someone cut up a mouse pad to repurpose as an ill-fitting useless facemask. 

But hey, what a great reminder that we have to wear masks because Trump pretended coronavirus would magically disappear, instead of doing his job. Wear it proudly failures!
